text:
Hello guys
looking for a freelance able to create API with HubSpot/Pennylane and Factorial to extract data for a Redash report.
Anyone interested?
For sure, do you happen to have a write up or Scope already made?

Hi!
We can make a custom integration between HubSpot and Pennylane
our portfolio : -
